sentence.text: Here, we applied domain-focused CRISPR screening to human cancer cell lines to identify the transcription factor (TF) negative regulation by host of viral transcription (POU class 2 homeobox 3; also known as smoothened signaling pathway-1a/regulation of cell migration-11) as a powerful dependency in a subset of SCLC lines.

entity.text: negative regulation by host of viral transcription

sentence.text: Moreover, we show that most SCLC tumors can be classified into one of three lineages based on the expression of POU2F3, negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, or NEUROD1.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
